text: The Zaarden Brothers (German: Die Brüder von Zaarden) is a 1918 German silent drama film directed by William Wauer and starring Albert Bassermann, Elsa Bassermann and Marija Leiko.Bock & Bergfelder p.28 ==Cast== * Albert Bassermann * Elsa Bassermann * Marija Leiko ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim. The Concise CineGraph. Encyclopedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:German films Category:Films of the German Empire Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by William Wauer
title: The Zaarden Brothers
